template.name: stringParam
template.value: INSERT INTO PARAMETER(ID, PARAMETER_TYPE, NULLABLE, MANAGEABLE, NAME, DESCRIPTION, STRING_VALUE, NUMERIC_VALUE, BOOLEAN_VALUE, PROFILE ) VALUES('$ID$', 'STRING', 0, 1, '$NAME$', '$NAME$', '$VALUE$', null, null, 'VM');
template.description: SQL Insert statement for STRING parameter

template.name: numParam
template.value: INSERT INTO PARAMETER(ID, PARAMETER_TYPE, NULLABLE, MANAGEABLE, NAME, DESCRIPTION, STRING_VALUE, NUMERIC_VALUE, BOOLEAN_VALUE, PROFILE ) VALUES('$ID$', 'NUMERIC', 0, 1, '$NAME$', '$NAME$', null, $VALUE$, null, 'VM');
template.description: SQL Insert statement for NUMERIC parameter

template.name: boolParam
template.value: INSERT INTO PARAMETER(ID, PARAMETER_TYPE, NULLABLE, MANAGEABLE, NAME, DESCRIPTION, STRING_VALUE, NUMERIC_VALUE, BOOLEAN_VALUE, PROFILE ) VALUES('$ID$', 'BOOLEAN', 0, 1, '$NAME$', '$NAME$', null, null, $VALUE$, 'VM');
template.description: SQL Insert statement for BOOLEAN parameter
